topic.title: How do I plot head, drawdown or concentration vs. time?

para.text: How do I plot head, drawdown or concentration vs. time?

body.para: A separate program, GW_Chart, can be used to plot a number of types of data vs. time. GW_Chart is available from <link displaytype="text" defaultstyle="true" type="weblink" href="<%LINK_CAPTION%>" target="_blank" styleclass="Normal" translate="true">https://water.usgs.gov/nrp/gwsoftware/GW_Chart/GW_Chart.html. To plot the data, first select Chart Type/Convert|Hydrographs. Then select the type of data, such as a MODFLOW head or drawdown file and other required data such as the column, row, and layer number. Finally, click the Read button to select the file and make the plot.
